info.title: Security Insights
info.description: API spec for Microsoft.SecurityInsights (Azure Security Insights) resource provider

post.description: Create a new threat intelligence indicator.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed to create indicators.
Error response describing why the operation failed to get indicators.

get.description: View a threat intelligence indicator by name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed to view an indicator.
Error response describing why the operation failed to update an indicator.
Error response describing why the operation failed to delete an indicator.

post.description: Query threat intelligence indicators as per filtering criteria.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get threat intelligence indicators metrics (Indicators counts by Type, Threat Type, Source).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed to get metrics.

post.description: Append tags to a threat intelligence indicator.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed to append tags.

post.description: Replace tags added to a threat intelligence indicator.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed to replace tags.

get.description: Gets all STIX Attack Patterns on the workspace.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates an Attack Pattern.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.
